content.text:
# List of Warner Bros. International films (2000–2009)

The following is a list of foreign films produced, co-produced, and/or distributed by Warner Bros. internationally in the 2000s. This does not include direct-to-video releases or films released under joint ventures (e.g Warner Sogefilms). For the German films Warner Bros. co-distributed with , see X Filme Creative Pool.
